text: Michael Shawn Crahan (born on September 24, 1969), is an American musician, music producer, and artist. He is better known by his stage name "Clown". He is best known as one of the two custom percussionists of Slipknot. He looks like a clown when he is wearing his mask. == References == Category:1969 births Category:American drummers Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Des Moines, Iowa Category:Roadrunner Records Category:Slipknot members
title: Shawn Crahan
